      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • operationSelector

        public static double operationSelector​(java.util.Scanner inputString,
                                       java.util.Scanner inputInt,
                                       java.lang.String operator,
                                       double[] memory,
                                       java.lang.String[] memoryNames,
                                       double a,
                                       int mode)
        Selects and makes an operation given a initial value "a" and an operator that is expressed in the cases of the switch, it also partially formats the result for the given mode.
        pre: The method for each operation must be written, or given in the corresponding case of the switch.
        Parameters:
        inputString - Created scanner for reading Strings. inputString!=null
        inputInt - Created scanner for reading numbers. inputInt!=null
        operator - Operator for selecting the operation to make. operator != null
        memory - [] The memory array must be initialized. memory != null
        memoryNames - [] The names of the values stored in memory[]. Must be initialized and fill with letters. memoryNames != null
        a - Initial value to participate in the operation. Must be initialized
        mode - Calculator mode to partially format the result. mode != 0
        Returns:
        result Result of the operation as a double.

      • operationValue

        public static double operationValue​(java.util.Scanner inputString,
                                    java.util.Scanner inputInt,
                                    double[] memory,
                                    java.lang.String[] memoryNames,
                                    int mode)
        The method asks for a value, if it corresponds to an operation it invokes the method operationSelector, if it corresponds to letter
        it invokes the memoryUse method, and if it corresponds to a number it stored as a double. At the end is returned the final stored value
        as a double
        pre: The methods operationSelector and memoryUse must be created.
        Parameters:
        inputString - Created scanner for reading Strings. inputString!=null
        inputInt - Created scanner for reading numbers. inputInt!=null
        memory - [] The memory array must be initialized. memory != null
        memoryNames - [] The names of the values stored in memory[]. Must be initialized and fill with letters. memoryNames != null
        mode - Calculator mode for method operationSelector. mode != 0
        Returns:
        value Final stored value as a double.

      • memoryUse

        public static double memoryUse​(java.util.Scanner inputString,
                               java.util.Scanner inputInt,
                               double[] memory,
                               java.lang.String[] memoryNames)
        The method allows the use of the memory[], given the corresponding letter of the memory value it returns it as a double to use in.
        further operations.
        Parameters:
        inputString - Created scanner for reading Strings. inputString!=null
        inputInt - Created scanner for reading numbers. inputInt!=null
        memory - [] The memory array must be initialized and fill with zeroes. memory != null
        memoryNames - [] The names of the values stored in memory[]. Must be initialized and fill with letters. memoryNames != null
        Returns:
        value Value to use in further operations.

      • memorySave

        public static int memorySave​(int memoryPosition,
                             double result,
                             double[] memory)
        Saves a given value to memory and stores the memoryPosition for the next time the method is invoked.
        pos: The memory[] is modified adding the new value
        Parameters:
        memoryPosition - Must be initialized. memoryPosition<11
        result - The result to store in the memory[].
        memory - [] The memory array must be initialized and fill with zeroes. memory != null
        Returns:
        memoryPosition The position to use the next time this method is invoked.

      • factorial

        public static double factorial​(java.util.Scanner inputString,
                               java.util.Scanner inputInt,
                               double[] memory,
                               java.lang.String[] memoryNames,
                               double a,
                               int mode)
        Calculates the factorial of a given number. The other parameters are requiered for re asking the user for another value, it could also be from the memory.
        Parameters:
        inputString - Created scanner for reading Strings. inputString!=null
        inputInt - Created scanner for reading numbers. inputInt!=null
        memory - [] The memory array must be initialized and fill with zeroes. memory != null
        memoryNames - [] The names of the values stored in memory[]. Must be initialized and fill with letters. memoryNames != null
        a - Value to take the factorial of.
        mode - Calculator mode required in method operationValue. mode != 0
        Returns:
        factorialResult Result of the factorial as a double.

      • squareRoot

        public static double squareRoot​(double a)
        Calculates the square root of a given value, does not check if the value is negative.
        Parameters:
        a - The value for calculating the root. a>0
        Returns:
        squareRootResult Result of the square root as a double.

      • intPower

        public static double intPower​(double a,
                              double b)
        Calculates the power of a given value with another value as an exponent.
        Parameters:
        a - Value of the base.
        b - Value of the exponent, must be an integer but as a double. b%1=0
        Returns:
        powerResult Result of the power as a double.

      • conversion

        public static java.lang.String[] conversion​(java.util.Scanner inputString,
                                            java.util.Scanner inputInt,
                                            java.lang.String conversionType,
                                            java.lang.String numberType)
        This method serves as the menu for the conversion mode in the calculator.
        pos: The array nnT is created.
        Parameters:
        inputString - Created scanner for reading Strings. inputString!=null
        inputInt - Created scanner for reading numbers. inputInt!=null
        conversionType - Must be initialized, must be an integer.
        numberType - Must be Initialized.
        Returns:
        nnT array composed of the converted value after conversion and the numerical system in which is expressed.

      • binToDec

        public static java.lang.String binToDec​(java.lang.String number)
        This method converts a binary number into a decimal.
        Parameters:
        number - Number in binary to convert to decimal, is assumed that is a valid binary. Must be a string
        Returns:
        decimalS Decimal value of the number as a string.

      • decToBin

        public static java.lang.String decToBin​(java.lang.String number)
        This method converts a decimal number into a binary number.
        Parameters:
        number - Number in decimal to convert to binary, is assumed that is a valid decimal, must be a String.
        Returns:
        binaryNumber Binary value of the number as a string.

      • hexToDec

        public static java.lang.String hexToDec​(java.lang.String number)
        This method converts a hexadecimal number into a decimal.
        Parameters:
        number - Number in hexadecimal to convert to decimal, is assumed that is a valid hexadecimal. Must be a String.
        Returns:
        decimalS Decimal value of the number as a string.

      • decToHex

        public static java.lang.String decToHex​(java.lang.String number)
        This method converts a decimal number into a hexadecimal number.
        Parameters:
        number - Number in decimal to convert to hexadecimal, is assumed that is a valid decimal, must be a String.
        Returns:
        hexNumber Hexadecimal value of the number as a string.
